vulnerable.commit_message:
net: sched: fix use-after-free in tc_new_tfilter()

Whenever tc_new_tfilter() jumps back to replay: label,
we need to make sure @q and @chain local variables are cleared again,
or risk use-after-free as in [1]

For consistency, apply the same fix in tc_ctl_chain()

vulnerable.cve_desc: A use-after-free exists in the Linux Kernel in tc_new_tfilter that could allow a local attacker to gain privilege escalation. The exploit requires unprivileged user namespaces. We recommend upgrading past commit 04c2a47ffb13c29778e2a14e414ad4cb5a5db4b5
